short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record screen with easy shareable links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more manually writing process guides or copying and pasting screenshots to share knowledge with your team. Just Add Float to your chrome browser and turn any process into a process guide in seconds.

Create Workflow in 3 Easy Step 
Step 1. Go to the URL you want to capture.
Step 2. Click on the Float extension to Record your Workflow
Step 3. Click on the Stop Capture to end. 

KEY FEATURES
‚ú® Automatically generated step-by-step workflow
üîó Easy link sharing
üåê Embed your workflow in Notion, WordPress, Google Docs, etc.

`‚úÖ` Dashboard tour - Create Dashboard tour in seconds with Float.

`‚úÖ` Product demo - Create a "try before you buy" guide with Float.
